About Discount Computer Depot
If you are looking for a clean, safe computer that works great then Discount Computer Depot is here to help. We are a Microsoft Authorized Refurbisher and certified to refurbish off-lease or previously owned business class computers and laptops. We strive to create value and a superior user experience for you and all of our customers.

We are happy to stand behind our products by offering a full 1 Year Warranty through Allstate on all of our refurbished computers and laptops. We refurbish our computers to a high standard based on functionality. All refurbished computers may have signs of normal usage, such as scratching on their case from being transported. The images of the products are in house stock photos and may vary slightly from the product you receive. Our limited warranty does not cover expendable items such as batteries, toner cartridges, projector bulbs and other operating supplies.
Our Refurbishing Process
We refurbish our computers with the customer's needs in mind. Your first impression is our highest standard, and that's why we designed refurbishing process that produces computers that look great and just work right out of the box. The technicians at Discount Computer Depot assess three main points in the refurbishing process:
1. Functionality
Each part is tested individually for full functionality before being installed or used in a computer or laptop.
2. Cosmetic Quality
Each computer or laptop is inspected for cleanliness and cosmetic defects. Because these are refurbished items we only pass through items that will be 4 out of 5 stars for refurbished products. (4 out of 5 Stars means there will be some scratches or rubbing to the metal and plastic cases.)
3. Longevity
Our goal is to evaluate current technology and match the functionality of our refurbished products as closely as possible to new products being sold today.
A+ Rated By The BBB
An Inc. 5000 Company
FREE SHIPPING
FREE 1 YEAR WARRANTY
*Warranty Through Allstate
FREE MICROSOFT SECURITY ANTI-VIRUS

Q. What product keys are included with my computer?
A. Your computer will include a new Genuine Microsoft Windows 10 Digital key.

Q. What accessories are included with computer?
A. Every computer we sell includes all necessary cables, product licenses, instructions and documentation. Laptops will come with Lithium Ion Batteries (Battery is not guaranteed to hold a charge.) The product description will list any additional accessories. If listed, included keyboard and mouse may not match brand of computer.

Q. How long will it take to receive my computer?
A. You will receive tracking information via email (the email address associated with your PayPal account) within three business days of purchase, and will be shipped fedex ground.

Q. Can I change shipping address after purchase?
A. Shipping address cannot be changed after purchase and must be a verified paypal address.

Q. What can you tell me about the monitor?
A. If a monitor is included, the size of your monitor is measured diagonally and is specified in the product listing. Brand of monitor may not be the same as the brand of computer.

Q. What type of computers do we sell?
A. We sell off-lease business and education computers than are business class. Business class computers are meant to last longer than consumer class computers.


Shipments
Handling
We will ship all orders within 3 business days of payment.

Delivery
Shipping is included for free with your purchase. We use FedEx for all of our shipping and provide tracking for all purchases. Shipments are sent only to the address provided by PayPal shipping account address. If you wish to have the item shipped to a different address, please change your shipping address in PayPal.

AI Noise Reduction
Enjoy clearer team conversations with AI noise reduction. Using artificial intelligence, it filters out background noise in multi-person environments and captures multidirectional sound with spatial awareness.

HP True Vision HD Camera with Microphone Mute and Camera Shutter
ideo chat with vibrant clarity, even in low light. Temporal noise reduction ensures you're always heard. Security features make it easy to maintain your privacy by turning off your mic and blocking your camera.

Microsoft Copilot

1 USB Type-C (5Gbps signaling rate), 2 USB Type-A (5Gbps signaling rate), 1 Headphone/microphone combo, 1 AC smart pin, 1 HDMI 1.4b

About Discount Computer Depot
If you are looking for a clean, safe computer that works great then Discount Computer Depot is here to help. We are a Microsoft Authorized Refurbisher and certified to refurbish off-lease or previously owned business class computers and laptops. We strive to create value and a superior user experience for you and all of our customers.

We are happy to stand behind our products by offering a full 1 Year Warranty through Allstate on all of our refurbished computers and laptops. We refurbish our computers to a high standard based on functionality. All refurbished computers may have signs of normal usage, such as scratching on their case from being transported. The images of the products are in house stock photos and may vary slightly from the product you receive. Our limited warranty does not cover expendable items such as batteries, toner cartridges, projector bulbs and other operating supplies.
Our Refurbishing Process
We refurbish our computers with the customer's needs in mind. Your first impression is our highest standard, and that's why we designed refurbishing process that produces computers that look great and just work right out of the box. The technicians at Discount Computer Depot assess three main points in the refurbishing process:
1. Functionality
Each part is tested individually for full functionality before being installed or used in a computer or laptop.
2. Cosmetic Quality
Each computer or laptop is inspected for cleanliness and cosmetic defects. Because these are refurbished items we only pass through items that will be 4 out of 5 stars for refurbished products. (4 out of 5 Stars means there will be some scratches or rubbing to the metal and plastic cases.)
3. Longevity
Our goal is to evaluate current technology and match the functionality of our refurbished products as closely as possible to new products being sold today.

About Discount Computer Depot
If you are looking for a clean, safe computer that works great then Discount Computer Depot is here to help. We are a Microsoft Authorized Refurbisher and certified to refurbish off-lease or previously owned business class computers and laptops. We strive to create value and a superior user experience for you and all of our customers.

We are happy to stand behind our products by offering a full 1 Year Warranty on all of our refurbished computers and laptops. We refurbish our computers to a high standard based on functionality. All refurbished computers may have signs of normal usage, such as scratching on their case from being transported. The images of the products are in house stock photos and may vary slightly from the product you receive. Our limited warranty does not cover expendable items such as batteries, toner cartridges, projector bulbs and other operating supplies.
Our Refurbishing Process
We refurbish our computers with the customer's needs in mind. Your first impression is our highest standard, and that's why we designed refurbishing process that produces computers that look great and just work right out of the box. The technicians at Discount Computer Depot assess three main points in the refurbishing process:
1. Functionality
Each part is tested individually for full functionality before being installed or used in a computer or laptop.
2. Cosmetic Quality
Each computer or laptop is inspected for cleanliness and cosmetic defects. Because these are refurbished items we only pass through items that will be 4 out of 5 stars for refurbished products. (4 out of 5 Stars means there will be some scratches or rubbing to the metal and plastic cases.)
3. Longevity
Our goal is to evaluate current technology and match the functionality of our refurbished products as closely as possible to new products being sold today.
A+ Rated By The BBB
An Inc. 5000 Company
FREE SHIPPING
FREE 1 YEAR WARRANTY
FREE MICROSOFT SECURITY ANTI-VIRUS

Q. What product keys are included with my computer?
A. Your computer will include a new Genuine Microsoft Windows 10 Digital License.

Q. What accessories are included with computer?
A. Every computer we sell includes all necessary cables, product licenses, instructions and documentation. Laptops will come with Lithium Ion Batteries. The product description will list any additional accessories. If listed, included keyboard and mouse may not match brand of computer.

Q. How long will it take to receive my computer?
A. You will receive tracking information via email (the email address associated with your PayPal account) within three business days of purchase, and will be shipped FedEx Ground/Home.

Q. Can I change shipping address after purchase?
A. Shipping address cannot be changed after purchase and must be a verified PayPal address.

Q. What can you tell me about the monitor?
A. If a monitor is included, the size of your monitor is measured diagonally and is specified in the product listing. Brand of monitor may not be the same as the brand of computer.

Q. What type of computers do we sell?
A. We sell off-lease business and education computers than are business class. Business class computers are meant to last longer than consumer class computers.

We will ship all orders within 3 business days of payment.

Shipping is included for free with your purchase. We use FedEx for all of our shipping and provide tracking for all purchases. We ship to United States and utilize the Ebay Global Ship Program. Shipments are sent only to the address provided by PayPal shipping account address. If you wish to have the item shipped to a different address, please change your shipping address in PayPal.
